title: Religious diversity in North America in 2010 , by religion
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories for the x axis representing Religion, and a y axis representing Percentage of population.
The highest category is found at Christians where Percentage of population is 77.0.
The lowest category is found at Muslims where Percentage of population is 1.0.
gold: This statistic shows religious diversity in North America in 2010 , by share of religious population . In 2010 , about 77 percent of population were Christians .
